sentences.sContent: God is too niggard to give a person all benefits , he may give you good looks instead of wisdom , money instead of health , talent instead of opportunities ….
sentences.sContent_eng: God is too niggard to give a person all benefits , he may give you good looks instead of wisdom , money instead of health , talent instead of opportunities ….
sentences.sCn: 上帝太小气不会给一个人所有的好处，他给你外表就不给你睿智，给你钱财就不给你健康，给你天资就不给你机会…

sentences.sContent: I know, I have been used to the so-called niggard eyes from others.
sentences.sContent_eng: I know, I have been used to the so-called niggard eyes from others.
sentences.sCn: 我知道，反正我已经习惯别人投来所谓的小气的眼光了。
